Name: Mayan
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge &/or coffee beans..
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim &/or float 3 coffee beans.
Review: Tequila, coffee and pineapple combine harmoniously in this medium-dry cocktail.
Nutrition: One serving of Mayan contains 165 calories
